New Records: Jalen Johnson matched a career high by scoring 29 points.
Key Match Events: Trae Young had a double-double with 23 points and 12 assists.
Brandon Ingram scored 32 points for the Pelicans.
The Hawks scored the first seven points of the third quarter to take a six-point lead.
The Hawks increased their lead to 88-77 with 3:53 to go in the third quarter.
The Pelicans trimmed their deficit to 93-85 by the end of the third quarter.
Johnson scored seven points during a 14-0 run that put the Hawks well ahead, 116-97, with 5:20 left in the game.
Atlanta outscored New Orleans 68-52 in the second half.
